name: I WILL BE THERE
description:
DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES?


I WILL BE THERE is the love story of a lonely man with an RV in a zombie-infested world. It is a unique 'Survival-Adventure' game with visual novel aestethics and role-playing elements.

Tyler is a middle aged man who longs to reach his loved one in a zombie infested world. Good news: He has an RV... and bad news: He has to go more than two-thousand miles. To do this, Tyler has to take care of himself and the RV, meet strangers and uncover truths along the way.

Features:


  • Many events you will encounter in this game are random, so every game is a unique adventure! Collect mushrooms, hunt rabbits, loot stashes...
  • Includes 16-color objects and backgrounds, inspired by pixelated retro games.
  • Background images consist of hundreds of photos of real-life locations, taken by the developer himself. No trip is alike!
  • A fully functional RV: You have to take care of all the maintenance of the RV where you eat, rest and get ready for the next day.
  • The Day/Night cycle allows you to travel & explore in daylight and spend the night in safety... or not. Your call.
  • With classic role-playing elements, distribute points among skills on the character creation screen. Create your own special character.
  • With the official soundtrack and sound effects to help you immerse yourself in the game, feel the loneliness deep inside.

Roadmap:


  • Bugfixes and balance tweaks will be delivered as needed in the months following the game's release. The community feedback is much appreciated!
  • New events and story elements will be added in future as an update; NOT as a paid DLC.
